content:
It hasn't been long since my last announcement... but this is a nice upgrade and I wanted to let everyone know. Plume version 0.3.0 just landed -- check it out https://github.com/lukewilliamboswell/plume

This is basically a lot of polish on the API, making it nicer to use and adding more coverage of the basics.

I've added an demo and link for each of the new examples in the README, so it's easy to see the package capabilities at a glance.

:heart: :bar_chart:
Love the new API. Clicks a bit more for me than the recent version :blush:
